item.title: Mayor issues stark warning to hotels: Act or shut down
item.description:
<![CDATA[Hyderabad: Mayor Gadwal Vijayalakshmi warned the restaurants, hotels, and other eateries that stringent measures will be enforced against any hotel that fails to uphold cleanliness standards in their kitchens. She urged hotel owners to prioritise the provision of healthy food options.
